metadata.title: CVE-2020-36152 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in readDataVar in hdf/dataobject.c in Symonics libmysofa0.5 - 1.1 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SOFA.

criterions.comment: libmysofa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
